title: S7E20 – "From the Vault" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author K.B. Hurst, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about holiday horrors, occult atrocities, insidious inspiration, and demonic discoveries.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
